page.title: 11Electric Equipment CONT.
page.content: from the television and play it back again and again. RADIOS, RECORD PLAYERS AND CASSETTE RECORDERS: These things are a way to hear music. A record player plays records which are round things which lets out music. A radio is a station which play music and has interviews with people. Cassette recorders play a thing called a tape. There is also a thing called a plug socket. If any of these electric equipment gets broken it can be mended by someone called a electrician. He then charges you a fee.
